dt-api.name: searchPanes.clearSelections()
dt-api.summary: Clears the selections in all of the panes.

type.description: Clears the selections in all of the panes.

dt-api.description:
This method provides the ability to clear all of the selections that have been made in the panes should a change occur on the associated DataTable. As the method purely clears the selections in the pane, it has no need for a return.
`-init searchPanes.clearSelections()` Takes no argument. It clears the selections in every pane.
